content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #91598 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #91598 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

I'm glad someone opened an issue about this because I'm also affected by another manifestation of this regression (I compile for musl target).
In the end I had to pin 1.56.1 everywhere and get rid of 1.57.0 after spending quite some time finding a way to work around this issue, to no avail.

If it was for me I'd say P-high/P-critical because I'm quite sure it will impact /hard/ people using the web framework Warp, for example.
I'm working to build a small repro, though I'm not sure how helpful would be (I like the example in this issue because it has no dependencies).
Minimal repros are always helpful! Ideally we will be able to add benchmarks to perf.rlo that cover this scenario to prevent similar issues in the future.
